about.title: About me

introduction.text: Hi! My name is <0>Víctor</0>, and I am a computer engineer by <1>Universitat Politècnica de València</1> with the mention of information technologies. My professional interest is mainly focused on the topics of <0>infrastructure</0>, <0>security</0> and <0>software</0> engineering.

cave.text: For me, <0>computing</0> is the pinnacle in the practical application of pure sciences as elegant and beautiful as mathematics and physics. It and its results (such as the internet) allow equally to all humans to <0>leave the <0>cave</0></0> on our own and to travel without limits or prejudices through knowledge.

about.principles: I believe that innovation and continuous improvement should be the key factors of any organization when defining its technological strategy and that they must necessarily be accompanied by <0>values</0> that guarantee that their application is beneficial for it and the whole of society:
